mapper.select: SELECT a.com_code comCode, a.com_name comName, a.buss_name bussName, a.com_num comNum, a.com_present comPresent, a.com_stock comStock, a.com_cost comCost, a.com_price comPrice, a.page_views pageViews, c.sort_code firstSortCode, c.sort_name firstSortName, b.sort_code secondSortCode, b.sort_name secondSortName, a.pic_path picPath, a.advertisement advertisement, a.author author, a.press press FROM t_commodity a LEFT JOIN (SELECT sort_code,sort_name,parent_code FROM t_commodity_sort) b ON a.sort_code = b.sort_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT sort_code,sort_name FROM t_commodity_sort) c ON c.sort_code = b.parent_code WHERE a.is_delete = 0 and com_code = #{comCode}
select sort_code firstSortCode, sort_name firstSortName, remark remark, version version from t_commodity_sort where is_delete = 0 and sort_level = 1 order by create_time desc

SELECT sort.sort_code, sort.sort_name, cmd.com_code, cmd.com_name, cmd.pic_path, cmd.com_price, cmd.version FROM t_commodity_sort sort LEFT JOIN t_commodity cmd ON sort.sort_code = cmd.sort_code WHERE sort.sort_level = 2 AND sort.is_delete = 0 AND cmd.is_delete = 0 AND sort.parent_code = #{firstSortCode}

select ass.ass_code assessCode, u.user_code userCode, ass.com_code comCode, u.user_name userName, ass.star_level starLevel, ass.ass_content assContent, ass.ass_time assTime from t_commodity_assess ass left join t_sys_user u on (ass.user_code= u.user_code) where ass.is_delete = 0 and ass.com_code = #{comCode}
AND ass.star_level in (4,5)
AND ass.star_level in (2,3)
AND ass.star_level = 1
order by ass.create_time desc
